select * from (select rownum rnum, v.* from (select join_idx, reg_idx, match_idx, PR.id, item_name, deal_loc, deal_time, done, ongoing, join_buy_num, PJ.id AS buyer_id from purchase_register PR left join purchase_match PM using(reg_idx) left join purchase_join PJ using(join_idx)
where (PR.id = #{id} OR PJ.id = #{id}) and ongoing = #{ongoing}) v)
where (PR.id = #{id} OR PJ.id = #{id}) and done = #{done} and ongoing is null) v)
where PR.id = #{id} OR PJ.id = #{id}) v)
where rnum between #{paging.start} and #{paging.end}
